entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
